titleStmt.title: The Humble petition and representation of the gentry, ministers, and others of the counties of Cumberland and Westmerland, to His Sacred Maiestie with His Maiesties answer thereunto, York, 5 Iuly, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Royal seal on p. [4]; His Majesty's answer on following p. 5-6.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
